snippet: Seifallah Ben Hassine, one of Osama bin Laden’s top lieutenants and Tunisia’s most wanted jihadist, was killed in an American airstrike in Libya last month, a senior United States official said.
abstract: United States reports that Tunisia's most wanted jihadist, Seifallah Ben Hassine, was killed in American airstrike in Libya in June.

byline.original: By CARLOTTA GALL and ERIC SCHMITT
byline.contributor: Carlotta Gall reported from Tunis, and Eric Schmitt from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Seifallah Ben Hassine, one of Osama bin Laden’s top lieutenants and Tunisia’s most wanted jihadist, was killed in an American airstrike in Libya last month, a senior United States official said.

headline.main: Jihadist From Tunisia Died in Strike in Libya, U.S. Official Says
headline.print_headline: U.S. Official Says Jihadist From Tunisia Died in Strike

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
